title: Mr Stuart answers the question
creator_credit: U.S.A Department of Agriculture, United States. Dept. of Commerce and Jarvia Guillard
brief_description: A retail sales training film showing how Mr Stuart, the owner of a typical small retail store, found an answer to increased competition in a buyer’s market and how he corrected bad selling habits which had developed in his store.
